name: Beneath The Sands: After the Incident
name_original: Beneath The Sands: After the Incident
description:
JamCraft5 entry by Roikku ( Lake Dead / Eero Hook )

WASD/arrows - movement

F - pick up and drop items / enter and exit vehicle

E - install machinery

ESC - Pause

K - Debug mode

Themes

Expire: Car parts expire and break. 

Alien: There is a thing that may count as alien.
